en.title: SRE Bot
en.heading: Site Reliability Engineering
en.subtitle: Our SRE Bot frontend has moved to Backstage

sections.heading: What's Changed?
sections.content: We've migrated the SRE Bot user interface to our unified platform: Backstage. This consolidation provides a better user experience and centralized access to self-serve capabilities for your organization.

sections.heading: Slack Integration
sections.content: Slack slash commands continue to work seamlessly. Simply use Slack to trigger SRE Bot workflows as before. For more complex tasks, visit Backstage.

sections.heading: API Access
sections.content: The SRE Bot REST API remains available for programmatic access. See the documentation for authentication and endpoint details.

en.help_content: For questions or issues, please reach out to the SRE team or consult our API documentation.
en.footer: SRE Bot API v1.0 ‚Ä¢ Powered by FastAPI
